1: <sup>1</sup> Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
2: <sup>2</sup> Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
3: <sup>3</sup> Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
4: <sup>4</sup> Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.
5: <sup>5</sup> Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
6: <sup>6</sup> Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
